title: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces. Build 200110251.
OB: When executing ShiftLeft on lines with intermixed tabs and spaces, nothing happens.
EB: The ShiftLeft operation should properly indent the lines irrespective of the presence of intermixed tabs and spaces.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a default text editor.
2. Type in the following lines:
   - First line with spaces
   - Second line with tabs
   - Third line with spaces
   - Fourth line with tabs
   - Fifth line with spaces and text
   - Sixth line with tabs and text
3. Highlight the two lines above the fifth line.
4. Execute the ShiftLeft operation.

Expected result:
The highlighted lines should be indented to the left along with the existing tabs and spaces on those lines.

Actual result:
Nothing happens when ShiftLeft is executed for lines with intermixed tabs and spaces.
